name: write-version-to-package-json
description: Loads the current version from the npm registry and writes it to package.json
author: Daniel Bartholomae <daniel@bartholomae.name>

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run test

scripts.pretest: npm run build && istanbul instrument lib/run.js | n-pipe lib-cov/run.js
scripts.test: npm run test:nsp && npm run test:mocha
scripts.watch: npm run pretest && n-run "npm run watch:pretest" "npm run watch:test"
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.commit-changelog: git commit CHANGELOG.md -n -m "docs: update changelog" || echo "No changes committed"
